instructions: Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap your Apple Watch at the top of the screen. Tap the Info button , then tap Unpair Apple Watch.

Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap your Apple Watch at the top of the screen. Tap the Info button , then tap Find My Apple Watch. In the Find My iPhone app on your iPhone, tap your watch to see its location on a map.

Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap your Apple Watch at the top of the screen. Tap the Info button , then tap Find My Apple Watch. In the Find My iPhone app on your iPhone, tap your watch, tap Actions, then tap Lost Mode.

Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap your Apple Watch at the top of the screen. Tap the Info button , then tap Find My Apple Watch. In the Find My iPhone app on your iPhone, tap your watch, tap Actions, then tap Erase Watch.
